dcterms:creator: J. Park
H. Oh
S. Lee
A. C. Bovik
dcterms:description: A stereo image database consisting of 800 stereoscopic image pairs with a resolution of 1920×1080 pixels and corresponding subjective comfort scores, covering 160 different scenes with 5 convergence points.
dcterms:title: IEEE-SA stereo image database

dcterms:creator: Q. Jiang
F. Shao
G. Jiang
M. Yu
Z. Peng
dcterms:description: A database consisting of 200 stereoscopic images with a resolution of 1920×1080 pixels and associated mean opinion scores (MOS) for visual comfort.
dcterms:title: NBU 3D-VCA database

dcterms:creator: Y. J. Jung
H. Sohn
S.-I. Lee
Y. M. Ro
dcterms:description: A database consisting of 120 stereoscopic images captured by a 3D digital camera with dual lenses, along with corresponding mean opinion score values for visual comfort.
dcterms:title: IVY Lab S3D image database
